name: A Journey Into Self
description:
Journey Into Self

ISBN 978-0-615-50264-9
104 pages

Journey Into Self: 100 Days of Guided Mindful Reflection is a self-paced journal, designed to assist people on their paths toward resolution and mindfulness. The focus is on making peace with our individual histories, learning to understand and care for the many layers of ourselves, and clarifying our paths through life. Participants in workshops Darla & Annabelle have given using this journaling process report that it has been a catalyst for lasting change in their lives. If you donâ€™t have an hour for yoga or meditation, you can still write for five or 10 minutes and be mindfully connected to yourself.
